title: The Creepy Ads and PSAs Iceberg: The 125+ Entry Analysis

media:group.media:title: The Creepy Ads and PSAs Iceberg: The 125+ Entry Analysis
media:group.media:description:
Advertisements and public service announcements AKA PSAs have been a part of human civilization for eons. I’m talkin’ word of mouth, flyers, newspapers, radio, billboards, television etc, you know what I’m talking about. Some of these ads or PSAs hit, some of them miss, and some… well, some are just flat out creepy. Let’s take a deep dive into The Creepy Ad and PSAs Iceberg.

CHAPTER TIMESTAMPS
00:00 Introduction
02:23 Layer 1: The Sky
11:39 Layer 2: The Tip of the Iceberg
21:48 Layer 3: Shallow Waters
32:27 Layer 4: The Body of the Iceberg
40:56 Layer 5: Deep Waters
46:27 Layer 6: Lonely Waters
52:02 Layer 7: Dark Waters
56:51 Layer 8: Uncharted Waters
01:03:00 Layer 9: ???
01:06:16 BONUS LAYER
01:08:31 Outro
